variant.bodyText: In the review of Progress in Speech Synthesis, edited by Jan P.H. van Santen, Richard W. Sproat, Joseph P. Olive, and Julia Hirschberg, that appeared in Compu- tational Linguistics 24(3), the editors' affiliation was wrongly listed. At the time the book was published, all four editors were at AT&T Bell Laboratories. (The first three editors are at now Lucent Technologies Bell Labs, and the fourth editor is at AT&T Research.) •

variant.note: Erratum the review of in Speech Synthesis, by Jan P.H. van Santen, W. Sproat, Joseph P. Olive, and Julia Hirschberg, that appeared in Compu- Linguistics the editors' affiliation was wrongly listed. At the time the book was published, all four editors were at AT&T Bell Laboratories. (The first three editors are at now Lucent Technologies Bell Labs, and the fourth editor is at AT&T Research.) •
